subject: Basketball
Blacks
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Though Mark Cuban, the outspoken owner of the Dallas Mavericks, suggested thinking twice before rushing to force Donald Sterling to sell the Clippers, the N.B.A. vote on the matter should be an uncontested layup.
snippet: Though Mark Cuban, the outspoken owner of the Dallas Mavericks, suggested thinking twice before rushing to force Donald Sterling to sell the Clippers, the N.B.A. vote on the matter should be an uncontested layup.
